author: cms-sw
body:
- update python3 to version 3.9.14 ( which is a security release). Can not update python to 3.10 series which requires OpenSSL 1.1.1. As we still support `slc7` releases which contain openssl 1.0.2. Although we can maintain two branches ( one for slc7 and one for el8) but lets lets stick to python 3.9
- update pip3 to latest version 22.2.2
- update setuptools to 63.4.3 ( can not update to latest 65.x or 64.x series as numpy does not work with that)
- Update many pip based packages. Some of the packages are not yet using their latest versions due to build issues ( new meson backend build system  not working correctly)
title: Bulk update of many python package
